tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Hot Cheetos & Takis [HD]
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Now available on iTunes : itunes.apple.com For more info & music visit: www.YNRichKids.com Twitter www.twitter.com Directed & Edited By: 13twentythree Photography Twitter: www.twitter.com Web: www.13twentythree.com Lyrics yo i go by the name of dame jones i'm with my crew and we gon' show yall what we be snackin' on ya dig (ok) HOT CHEETOS & TAKIS, hot cheetos & takis i can't get enough of these hot cheetos & takis got my fingers stained red and i cannot get 'em off me you can catch me & my crew eating hot cheetos & takis bow SNACK, SNACK, SNACK... CRUNCH SNACK, SNACK, SNACK... MUNCH hot cheetos & takis, hot cheetos & takis you can catch me & my crew eating HOT CHEETOS & TAKIS [dame jones] its about a quarter to a 4, rollin to the store (what you 'bout to get?) hah, you already know got like 3 or 4 dollars and a couple odd cents bout to cop me some hot cheetos and a lemonade brisk i'm ridin around on my bicycle, ridin' around on my bicycle pull up to the studio cuz you know that the kid be meltin' them microphones munchin' on my takis like i just don't care then i walked up to your girl and she asking me to share bow [nasir] yo, i'm hungry where them cheetos at? they stay bitin' like where them mosquitoes at? i'm on point like a elbow, hands red like elmo my mama said "have u had enough?" i looked and i said "no ma'am" i go ham, in the grocery store orange fanta and takis ridin' with my allowance, so nobody can stop me all the kids wanna be him, go crazy when they see him ...

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Odd﻿ Future?
We saw this in﻿ school today ._.
AAAWWWWWW﻿ YEEEAAAAAAHHHHH xD Hot Cheetos & Takis!! The ultimate food source!!
Oh my god.... 2:46 fthat sucks﻿
This is dope mayn!! Hot Cheetos and Takis. I'm﻿ on diet but now I want some.
The One Wit﻿ The Glasses Go To Mah Schoo
Wow. they﻿ should eat more and Get fat. Aha .
what do you expect them to rap about? they dont﻿ collect money, dont play with guns, etc....
2:46 is this groups﻿ ODB
i swear that the kid at 2:45﻿ said nigga...
If you listen to what they are saying, some of the lyrics are very clever. These kids are talented. And they sound better half﻿ the *real* rappers out here.
This song is﻿ raw. I hope these kids make more like this!
oh, this is good!!﻿
receeding﻿ hairline already

The bitch who started rapping ruined﻿ that shit.
The bald nigger with the glasses was the best.
lmao he the next soulja﻿ boy
*sigh* what a dumb﻿ question.
Are we really at the point where kids "rap" about﻿ junkfood? I feel ashamed to live near these kids.
LOL all I understood﻿ was, "you know what's next.... Takis!"
they are actually pretty good but there are so many﻿ better snack foods out there, plus the stereotype of food to race is hilarious
Ahhhhh l.. I was about to﻿ watch a different video. UNTIL I saw a girl start rapping. Aha that's BADASS

➊ if every person who﻿ sees this comment gives me a helping hand, my life can change in the BLINK of an eye..☚
➋ so all I ask is that you PLEASE help out ＡＮＤ I truly thank whoever plans to do so☚
➌ I'm a 16 yr old MC & would appreciate﻿ if you all would listen to my new song "NEW DAY" on my channel☚
➍ won't brag about how good I am either, YOU be the judge☚
➎﻿ please thumbs up too so others can know about me & SUBSCRIBE to stay updated on new ＭＵＳＩＣ☚
✪a BIG thanks 2 everyone who helped!✪
I didn't even pick﻿ that up.
lmao @ 2:46 ﻿

Reviewer.Job: Im in a band "Dont tell no body".

Reviewer.Movies: edward scissor hands,this is it,cat in the hat [real life],tron,etc.
The Walking Dead/ War shows/ Any movies with guns
Reviewer.Music: Approaching Nirvana, Klaas- Our Own Way, Music from Spore Galactic Adventures
The Devil Wears Prada, August Burns Red, For Today, Oh, Sleeper, Jesus Culture.
